description:
Rukia is angered when Kaien tells her to hand over her friends in return for letting her go and is convinced that this Kaien is a fake. She attacks Kaien with every technique she knows, but he dodges them all. Kaien claims that he knows all about Rukia`s ability because he`s the real Kaien. When he releases his Zanpakuto, Nejibana, Rukia struggles to believe that this person could actually be her former lieutenant.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rukia Hangeki! Kesshi no Kidou o Hanate
Rukia Retaliates! Release the Desperate Kidou
ルキア反撃! 決死の鬼道を放て
